definition: to pick up what others say (idiom); to pass off other people's opinions as one's own/to parrot
to pick up/to collate or arrange/ten (banker's anti-fraud numeral)
to ascend in light steps
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
tooth/ivory/CL:顆|颗[ke1]
intelligent

sentences.english: The least of man's original emanation is better than the best of borrowed thought.
sentences.chinese: 人最渺小的原创火花也比最优秀的拾人牙慧要强。

sentences.english: He talks like a parrot and just repeats what he heard.
sentences.chinese: 他只是鹦鹉学舌，拾人牙慧罢了。

sentences.english: His article is full of hand-me-down concepts.
sentences.chinese: 他那篇文章尽是拾人牙慧的观念。
我讨厌拾人牙慧，告诉我你知道些什么。

definition: to follow in other people's footsteps
lit. Dong Shi imitates Xi Shi's frown (idiom)/fig. to mimick sb's idiosyncrasies but make a fool of oneself
repetition/other person's opinion/hearsay/parroting
(of a writing etc) to have no substance (idiom)/to carry no weight
the attitude of mechanically borrowing (ideas etc)
lit. to wave around one's bookbag (idiom)/fig. to show off one's erudition/a person who does so
to copy the way they walk in Handan (idiom)/slavishly copying others, one risks becoming a caricature
sensationalism/vulgar claptrap to please the crowds/playing to the gallery/demagogy
to make a fool of oneself/to make oneself a laughing stock
to try to draw a tiger but end up with a likeness of a dog (idiom)/to try to do sth overambitious and end up botching it
pinyin: hua4 hu3 bu4 cheng2 fan3 lei4 quan3

definition: to parrot/to repeat uncritically what sb says
to make far-fetched claims (idiom)/to offer outlandish explanations
cliché/commonplace/truism/stereotype
lit. to build a cart behind closed doors/to be overly subjective and disregard the outside world (idiom)
to try to draw a tiger but end up with a likeness of a dog (idiom)/to try to do sth overambitious and end up botching it
lit. drawing a tiger using a cat as a model (idiom); fig. to follow a model and get things more or less right but without capturing the spirit of the subject/uninspired imitation
